dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2595 IH: American Parks American Products Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Israel (for himself and Ms. Kaptur) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To help ensure that all items offered for sale in any gift shop of the National Park Service or of the National Archives and Records Administration are produced in the United States, and for other purposes.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
American Parks American Products Act .

section.header: Requiring that items sold in certain Federal gift shops are produced in the United States

subsection.text: The Secretary of the Interior shall ensure that all items offered for sale in any gift shop or visitorâ€™s center located within a unit of the National Park System are produced in the United States.
The Archivist of the United States shall ensure that all items offered for sale in any gift shop of the National Archives and Records Administration are produced in the United States.
